Josh Davis has been working with Penn State Athletics since  PERIOD As an assistant strength and conditioning coach of Olympic sports Davis and the other coaches in his office work with a number of sports PERIOD

But it was only last year when Dawna Prevette took over the Penn State womens tennis team that Davis worked a lot with the team PERIOD

 Davis said PERIOD Prior to that the old coach didnt really utilize our staff and require them to be lifting and working out all the time.Josh is incredible he does a great job with the teamWere very happy to have him on board PERIOD Hes definitely helped the girls with a lot of their strengthening and quickness and we just appreciate whats he doing over there because he works extremely hard.Theyll usually do a warmup of some sort which takes about  minutesA dynamic warmup where theyre moving and stretching in the middle of all that.Theyll do 110s or theyll do 60yard shuttles or 300yard shuttlesWell just progress that every week PERIOD So if they do three one week theyll do four next week PERIOD Or well make the time shorter that they have to get it in just so that were always pushing them to get better.Ive been getting to more balls on courtA lot of the things we do are long distancetype sprints going across the field PERIOD So it helps with endurance.One of our goals is to be explosiveI feel like the girls are more explosive with the quickness able to have stronger endurance PERIOD We have a good endurance base PERIOD Were just stronger overall. if youre interested in submitting a Letter to the Editor click here PERIOD

Were always interested in hearing about news in our community PERIOD Let us know whats going on
